get.summary: Find tasks with Process Variables Admin

parameters.name: variableKeys
parameters.description: Used to retrieve process variables. It is constructed from process definition key and variable name, e.g.: {processDefinitionKey}/{variableName}.

parameters.name: variables.name
parameters.description: Filters the task search results by task variable name, required with value.

parameters.name: variables.value
parameters.description: Filters the task search results by task variable value, required with name.
